subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Dominique Hawkins, a sophomore guard, was a high school star in Kentucky and dreamed of being a Wildcat, but he doesn’t get to play much on an undefeated team.
snippet: Dominique Hawkins, a sophomore guard, was a high school star in Kentucky and dreamed of being a Wildcat, but he doesn’t get to play much on an undefeated team.
